forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and becoming windy. Rain may be heavy late. Low around 15C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and windy at times. Rain becoming heavy at times late. Low 58F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain, possibly heavy at times early. Winds diminishing late. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 16C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Rain, heavy at times early. Potential for heavy rainfall. High around 60F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low around 10C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
